description: Wood anemone (Anemone nemorosa 'Lychette') is an amazing species of plant with bright white flowers and attractive purple-tipped petals. It is an early bloomer, flowering from April to June and is often found in woodlands and grasslands. It is a beautiful addition to any garden and is particularly attractive when planted in groups or as a mass planting. It is easy to grow and care for, and tolerates a variety of soils. It is deer and rabbit resistant and is perfect for adding color and texture to a garden. Wood anemone is a must have for any garden, and will be sure to amaze you with its beauty.
